Package gears.sidescroller.world.areas

package gears.sidescroller.world.areas
The areas package contain classes relevant to Areas: defining, randomly generating, and serializing them. Areas hold all the static tiles, interactive machines and items, and sentient entities which make up a world.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Area
    An Area is a complete, playable world where a Player can explore.
    AreaGenerator
    The AreaGenerator is used to randomly create new Areas.
    AreaJson
     
    LightGrid
    The LightGrid is used to apply dynamic lighting to an Area
    PowerGrid
    The PowerGrid is used by an Area to denote which tiles are being supplied electrical power, and which are not.
